ThingDef.label: egg box
ThingDef.description: A box with soft material made to hold eggs. Egg-laying animals will lay eggs in egg boxes if they can. Your haulers will take all the eggs out only when the box is full, to save time. The box also protects eggs from deteriorating outdoors, though it does not protect from temperature damage.

ThingDef.label: orbital trade beacon
ThingDef.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods to orbital traders if they're near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.

ThingDef.label: comms console
ThingDef.description: Allows radio contact with other factions and orbital traders.

ThingDef.label: firefoam popper
ThingDef.description: When it detects fire, this safety device pops and sprays a fire-retardant foam in a circular field around itself. Can also be triggered manually.

ThingDef.label: moisture pump
ThingDef.description: Very slowly equalizes moisture in nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground, and soft sand into normal sand. Does not affect deep water.

ThingDef.label: ground-penetrating scanner
ThingDef.description: A sensor unit used by researchers to search for buried resources. The chance to find a resource depends on the operator's research ability. It consumes a lot of electricity. If you find a buried resource, you'll need to use deep drills to extract it. It doesn't work under a roof.

ThingDef.label: long-range mineral scanner
ThingDef.description: A lateral sensor unit used by researchers to detect a specific type of mineral across the planet. The chance to find a resource depends on the operator's research ability. This sensor can be tuned to target a specific resource type. It consumes a lot of electricity. If you find a resource, you'll need to travel to collect it.

ThingDef.label: pod launcher
ThingDef.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.

ThingDef.label: transport pod
ThingDef.description: A launchable sub-orbital cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for sending gifts, transporting people or supplies, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.

ThingDef.label: multi-analyzer
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed when placed near hi-tech research bench and unlocks new research projects. Each research bench can only use one multi-analyzer.

ThingDef.label: vitals monitor
ThingDef.description: Increases medical tend quality, surgery success chance, and immunity gain speed when placed directly adjacent to a hospital bed. Only works for hospital beds - normal beds will not benefit. Attaching more than one vitals monitor to the same bed will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: tool cabinet
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed when placed near a workbench. One workbench can use up to two tool cabinets.

ThingDef.label: grave
ThingDef.description: A decent final resting place. Colonists will visit full graves to gain meditative joy.

ThingDef.label: sarcophagus
ThingDef.description: An ornamented burial receptacle for the honored dead.

ThingDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.

ThingDef.Name: AncientCryptosleepCasket
ThingDef.label: ancient cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?

ThingDef.label: marriage spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.

ThingDef.label: party spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot for throwing parties.

ThingDef.label: caravan packing spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot for forming caravans. Put this near your stockpiles to speed up the caravan loading process.

ThingDef.label: large stele
ThingDef.description: A tall, thick slab with engravings on the sides. Steles have been used since ancient times to memorialize individuals, battles, and other important events.

ThingDef.label: grand stele
ThingDef.description: A towering slab with extensive engravings on the sides. Steles have been used since ancient times to memorialize individuals, battles, and other important events.

ThingDef.label: pen marker
ThingDef.description: A post with a sign designating an animal pen. It must be placed in an area enclosed by fences, barricades, walls, and doors. You can assign each pen marker a set of animals to accept, and handlers will bring animals to an appropriate pen.
